nodes.bodyText:
Too much indent tabulation.
"required = false" is not really needed, but for clarity sake I think it's ok. wdyt?


  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                                            @ApiParam(value = "optional user id to be used instead of authenticated user - only when bypass authenticated user is enabled", required = false) @QueryParam("user") String userId,
          
          
            
                        @ApiParam(value = "optional user id to be used instead of authenticated user - only when bypass authenticated user is enabled") @QueryParam("user") String userId,
Not really sure whether we need to pass "containerId" as it was done before? Why it is not required now from a functional point of view?
Why is it marked as Smoke category? couldn't find any test suite to execute this category
not sure why "events.size() - 1"? shouldn't we get always events.size = 1? if not, why events.size - 1 would return "admin" as userId?
this method doesn't throw any exception
